SCHOOL ADMINISTRATION BUILDING
DIVISION OF
ELEMENTARY EDUCATION
THREE EAST TWENTY FIFTH STREET
BALTIMORE IB, MARYLAND
November 27, 1957
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Department of Educational Television Research
lli Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Sirs:
I am preparing, at the present time, an evaluation of the
effectiveness of television in the learning situation. To make
this as broad and comprehensive a study as possible, it would be
valuable to obtain any materials related to the actual measureÂ¬
ments and statistics that have been compiled as the results of
experiments along with the interpretation of the experimenter.
Please reply at your earliest convenience as this material
must be compiled and analyzed before Christmas. If there is a
charge for these materials, please bill me at the above address.
Hoping to hear from you soon.
Sincerely yours.
Specialist in Curriculum Education
